TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

- - - Updated - - -

the ladder and airlock issues have now been fixed

also I got time to add actual kerbal seating so you can see them piloting the shuttle.

you have to enter via EVA.

see jeb so happy.

- - - Updated - - -

and also the first parts of the space station can be downloaded and built.

the multiple docking ports on one part has worked out ok.

no more separate docking bits in between modules mainly for the Russian parts right now

I am still working on completing the rest. it will take more time.

next stage is making the trusses join end to end with no extra parts.

realism overhaul patch is being updated as I go

so I am up to this stage:

info on the iss thread.

link on page one

- - - Updated - - -

currently a full download with the extra parts but functionality not added completely. can still be built but will need addon dock ports or hyper-editing into space

canadarm2 almost done also.

connected living space functionality added to parts and space shuttle too

- - - Updated - - -

both cargobay door textures now switchable

v1.7.3.2 is up.

Strange. Saw the vid.

Is that using mechjeb or something. I never get that

i normaly do it a 5 to 6

even when i start it at 1 and i hit 6k it flips out like before

What versions of MechJeb, KSP, and CSS do you have? I suspect the kraken-like behavior is because you are using a mod for 1.0.4 on an older version like 0.90 that had the old aerodynamics. Also, you REALLY should start your gravity turn before you hit 100 m/s. And, please try to make your posts at least understandable (i.e. making sure that you don't omit any letters and specifiy the units you are talking about, as I have no idea whether 5 means kilometers or meters; and read over it once before you post). It is hard to help someone who has an issue, but the post is vague and/or makes no sense; I'm not being a grammar nut, I am just trying to make it easier for us to help you.

Blah Blah Blah Disclaimer stuff: I am not trying to backseat moderate.

mecjeb is 1.0.4 and css and KSP also 1.0.4.
